Name: Essex
Reclassified:
CV- to CVA-9 October 1952
CVA- to CVS-9 March 1960
see SCB-27 and SCB-125 for conversion information
awards:
Presidential Unit Citation (United States)
Navy Unit Commendation
Navy Meritorious Unit Commendation
Displacement:
27,100 long tons (27,500 t) (standard)
36,380 long tons (36,960 t) (full load)
Armament:
4 × twin, 4 × single 5 in (127 mm) DP guns
8 × quadruple 40 mm (1.6 in) AA guns
46 × single 20 mm (0.8 in) AA guns
Armor:
Waterline belt: 2.5–4 in (64–102 mm)
Deck: 1.5 in (38 mm)
Hangar deck: 2.5 in (64 mm)
Bulkheads: 4 in (102 mm)
Aircraft carried:
90 (1943): 36 × Grumman F4F Wildcat; 36 × Douglas SBD Dauntless; 18 × Grumman TBF Avenger

103 (1945): 73 × Grumman F6F Hellcat; 15 × Curtiss SB2C Helldiver; 15 × Grumman TBF Avenger
